    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Description copied from class: UpdatableEntity
        This is the update function for this entity. It will be called once on every iteration of the RpgGame.engine's core update loop.
        Specified by:
        update in class UpdatableEntity
        Parameters:
        delta - The time since the last frame.

      • draw

        public void draw(float delta,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        Description copied from class: DrawableEntity
        This is the draw function for this entity. It will be called automatically on every iteration of RpgGame.engine's core update loop. Don't worry about calling SpriteBatch.begin() or SpriteBatch.end(), because those functions should both be called within ScreenBase.render(float) before and after RpgGame.engine is updated.
        Specified by:
        draw in class DrawableEntity
        Parameters:
        delta - The time since last frame.
        batch - The SpriteBatch used to draw (RpgGame.batch, automatically passed to this entity by DrawSystem).
